弰字的基本解释

弰
shāo
弓的末端：“轻云飘马足，明月动弓弰。”
指弓：“壮士走马去，镫前弯玉弰。”

弰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāo］
［《廣韻》所交切，平肴，生。］
(1)弓的未梢。
(2)借指弓箭。
(3)通“矟”。

弰字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　弰； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页358第22
【廣韻】【正韻】所交切【集韻】【韻會】師交切，?音稍。【玉篇】弓使箭。　又弓末也。【廣韻】弓弰。【集韻】弓末。

弰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
弰字的起名意思

暂无。

end of a bow
Basic explanation of words
end of a bow
shāo
The end of the bow: "Light clouds and horse feet, the bright moon moves the bow."
Pointing to the bow: "The strong man walks, and the stirrup is bent forward."
end of a bow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāo]
["Guangyun" cross cut, flat food, raw. ]
(1) The tip of the bow.
(2) By means of bows and arrows.
(3) Through "矟".
end of a bow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Bow Character Department] 　弰; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 358 and 22
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Intersections [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Association] Intersections with teachers, with a slight tone. 【Jade articles】Bows and arrows.　It's also the end of the bow. [Guang Yun] Gong Lai. [Ji Yun] At the end of the bow.
